archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Track Party Problem
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Assign and monitor the jeopardy status of a party problem.

properties.value: Track Party Problem assigns and monitors the jeopardy status of a party problem, may escalate its jeopardy status, and notify applicable parties of a party problem in jeopardy. Note that lists of contacts related to a process such as this can be maintained by a generalized process such as Process Management & Support that is part of Enterprise Effectiveness Management in the Enterprise domain.
